metadata.description: Learn how Next.js Starter Kit collects, uses, and protects your data.

overview.title: Overview
overview.body: SparkMap is a cross-platform mind mapping application. This policy explains how we handle your data. Your data is stored securely on our servers to enable synchronization across all your devices.

collection.title: Information we collect
collection.body: We collect the following information to provide our services:

items.auth: Account Information: We collect your email address and full name solely for authentication and account management purposes. We do not use this information to track you.
items.content: User Content: We store your mind maps and related content on our secure servers to provide cross-device synchronization.

usage.title: How we use information
usage.body: We use your account information to authenticate you and secure your account. We use anonymous analytics data (if enabled) to monitor application stability and improve the user experience.
usage.note: We do not use your personal information for tracking or advertising purposes.

sharing.title: Sharing and disclosure
sharing.body: We do not sell your personal information. We only share anonymous analytics data with Firebase to operate our analytics services.

retention.title: Data retention
retention.body: Your account information and mind maps are retained as long as your account is active. You can request deletion of your account and data at any time.

security.title: Security
security.body: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data stored on our servers and during transmission.

children.title: Children's privacy
children.body: SparkMap does not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to this policy
changes.body: We may update this policy as SparkMap evolves. Review it periodically.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: For questions about privacy, please contact the SparkMap team.

accounts.title: Accounts and authentication
accounts.body: SparkMap uses secure authentication. You are responsible for safeguarding your credentials and for any activity that occurs under your account.

thirdParty.title: Third-party services
thirdParty.body: SparkMap integrates third-party services such as Firebase. Your use of those services is also subject to their terms and privacy policies.

starterKit.title: Service nature
starterKit.body: SparkMap is provided as a service. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time.

termination.title: Termination
termination.body: Access may be suspended or terminated at any time for violations of these terms or for operational reasons.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.body: The service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. No warranties are provided, and you use it at your own risk.

hero.title: SparkMap
hero.subtitle: The ultimate mind mapping tool for creative thinkers. Organize your thoughts, plan projects, and unleash your creativity with a beautiful, intuitive interface available on all your devices.

features.title: Why SparkMap?
features.description: Designed to help you think clearly and work efficiently.

visualThinking.title: Visual Thinking
visualThinking.description: Break down complex ideas into manageable visual nodes. Connect concepts seamlessly.

collaboration.title: Real-time Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work together with your team in real-time. See changes as they happen.

templates.title: Smart Templates
templates.description: Jumpstart your brainstorming with library of professionally designed templates.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Sync
crossPlatform.description: Your mind maps sync instantly across Web, Android, iOS, and macOS.

aiAssistance.title: AI Copilot
aiAssistance.description: Let AI help you expand your ideas, generate outlines, and summarize branches.

export.title: Versatile Export
export.description: Export your maps to PDF, PNG, Markdown, or Word documents for easy sharing.

testimonials.title: Loved by Thinkers
testimonials.description: See what our users are saying about how SparkMap transformed their workflow.

user1.name: Sarah Chen
user1.quote: SparkMap has completely changed how I plan product roadmaps. The visual interface is intuitive and the sync is flawless.

user2.name: Mark Johnson
user2.quote: The best tool for visualizing system architecture. I love the dark mode and the keyboard shortcuts.

user3.name: Emily Rodriguez
user3.quote: Finally, a mind map tool that looks as good as it works. The design is beautiful and keeps me in the flow.
